mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company_contact_person ( cpy_id, ccp_name, ccp_telephone, ccp_email, ccp_qq, ccp_card, ccp_img_card1, ccp_img_card2, ccp_createtime ) VALUES ( #{cpyId}, #{ccpName}, #{ccpTelephone}, #{ccpEmail}, #{ccpQq}, #{ccpCard}, #{ccpImgCard1}, #{ccpImgCard2}, sysdate() )
mapper.update: UPDATE company_contact_person SET ccp_name = #{ccpName}, ccp_qq = #{ccpQq}, ccp_telephone = #{ccpTelephone} WHERE cpy_id = #{cpyId}
mapper.select: SELECT ccp_name AS ccpName, ccp_qq AS ccpQq, ccp_telephone AS ccpTelephone FROM company_contact_person WHERE cpy_id = #{cpyId} ORDER BY ccp_createtime DESC LIMIT 1
